mapper.insert: INSERT INTO symptomcheck (user_code, date, checklist) VALUES (#{user_code}, #{date}, #{checklist})
mapper.select: SELECT checklist_item, COUNT(*) AS frequency FROM ( SELECT JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(checklist, CONCAT('$[', numbers.n, ']'))) AS checklist_item FROM symptomcheck JOIN ( SELECT @row := @row + 1 AS n FROM (SELECT 0 UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9) a, (SELECT 0 UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9) b, (SELECT @row := -1) r ) AS numbers ON JSON_LENGTH(checklist) > numbers.n WHERE user_code = #{user_code} AND DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m') = #{month} ) AS checklist_items GROUP BY checklist_item ORDER BY frequency DESC;
